data.message:
Eminem because you brought up clothes... 

Hey Slim... 
before ya get all crazy, 
And set the camp fires blazing,
with those lyrics that will slay, 
this rap game again,
with something deep and creepy,
like Hitchcock reborn,
and we're back in 1960.
Like you woke us all up
From this crazy dream
Where we were all having nightmares
about our Rap God sleeping.
Wake up!  Stakes are up!
Cry Havoc, ignore odds!
Call the war dogs out,
Shake fists at those Greek Gods
A play date, can't wait,
Mashall Mathers & Phil Knight?
Free-style, 
madd style, 
Get creative and tight
Make them clean, 
make them sick...
Eminem... common Em...
If you're making clothes...
Make us some custom kicks!

2017 Eminem Signature Custom Air Max Nikes?  

#CampShady   
Nike
